The communal bank is called October 27, it is located in the San Sofia neighborhood, part of the Ventanas area, they work in short cycle agriculture corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Luis works in agriculture, especially in corn, rice and beans. He buys his items each month in Ventanas and sells them in the market in the same area.

Luis needs the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and manure. The support from the loan will help him meet his economic needs. Luis faces different challenges like plagues and diseases that hurt his crops. His dream is to have a ranch and to buy a car.

Luis enjoys being with his parents and doing sports.

loans.use: buy seeds, fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Amor Y Esperanza 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.en:
Gislaine is the coordinator of her group Amor y Esperanza 3, 4, 5 (love and hope).  She makes her home here in a simple structure with her husband and their two children.  She says that her biggest challenge is to give her kids all they need and to educate them.  After this 5th loan, she has been able to provide for these changes for her children.  She is also planning to develop herself by learning more about her clients and what the community need.

Gislaine is excited to be taking her fifth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business.  She has had her business for almost 5 years.  She started by selling different products from a bag with some savings she had.  She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying big packages of used clothing, also she is starting the sales of new clothing.  She had expand her business into more products and clients.  She will use the profits to save and reinvest in her business.

Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo. and this group of 15 people is joined by Haitians citizen, who emigrated to the Dominican Republic for a better life.

loans.use: to buy second hand packages and new clothing

loans.name: Sop Serigne Fallou Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 10 décembre 2010; il est composé de dix huit femmes du même quartier. Les activités qu'elles mènent sont le petit commerce et l'embouche ovine.

La responsable Ndieya est âgée de 49 ans, est mariée mère de trois enfants. Son activité principale est le petit commerce de fruits et de chaussures. Elle a une bonne expérience Elle est habillée en jaune,a levé la main gauche et est à droite sur la photo.

Elle achète des chaussures, des mangues, de l'arachide au marché central et dans les grandes villes et les revend dans le village.

Son prêt lui permettra de renforcer son activité et de diversifier ses marchandises afin de faire beaucoup plus de gain.

Ses bénéfices lui permettent de soutenir son mari dans les charges familiales, d'épargner et de gérer ses besoins personnels.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on 10 December 2010. It comprises eight women who live in the same area. Their main activities are running small businesses and raising sheep.

Ndieya, the woman responsible for the group, is 49 years old, married, and has three children. Her main activity is selling fruit and shoes. She has gained lots of experience. In the photo, she is on the right, dressed in yellow with her left hand raised.

She buys shoes, mangoes, and peanuts at the central market and in the large cities and re-sells them in town.

Her loan will allow her to strengthen her capital and diversify her merchandise in order to substantially increase her earnings.

Her profits will allow her to support her husband in providing for the family, save, and manage her personal needs.

loans.use: To buy shoes and fruit destined for sale.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: El joven Javier, tiene 35 años de edad, es moto taxista  trabaja desde el 2009 eligió  este tipo de trabajo por que le parecía  muy  rentable, javier es soltero con el esfuerzo que ha puesto en su vida se compró  su propia moto taxi, vive en casa  de sus  padres, tiene  buenas referencias por parte de sus compañeros de trabajo y de sus vecinos,javier  es una persona muy emprendedora las dificultades que enfrenta diariamente, es la competencia que tiene día a día, enfrenta esta competencia trabajando de lunes a domingo, el dinero del prestamo sera invertido en comprar accesorio para su unidad de transporte,su sueño en el futuro es tener otra moto taxi y formar su su propia familia, javier esta muy agradecido con el apoyo que se le esta brindando.
texts.en: The young man, Javier, is 35 years old. He has been a motorcycle taxi driver since 2009; he chose this type of work because he thought it was very profitable. Javier is single and with the great efforts that he puts into his life, he bought his own motorcycle taxi. He lives in his parents’ home and has good references by his workmates and neighbors. Javier is a very enterprising person as he faces his daily obstacles like competition by working Monday through Sunday. The money from the loan will be used to buy accessories for his motorcycle taxi. His dreams are to have another motorcycle taxi and to have his own family. Javier is very grateful for the support that is being given to him.

loans.use: buy accessories for his motorcycle taxi like a grill, chains and other items.

loans.name: Lenin Gustavo

texts.es: El señor Lenin, es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto  a su esposa la cual labora en una empresa privada, los planes futuros es poder terminar de construir su vivienda   ya que por su situación económica no puede comprar de una sola vez todos materiales (cerámica)  ya que es su prioridad por la salud de su hijo, que desde que nació tiene serios problemas de alergia. Agradece la confianza que le brinda Afodenic atrávez de fondo Kiva para el mejoramiento de vivienda, sobre todo a las personas de escasos recursos.
texts.en: Mr. Lenin lives in the Ticuantepe municipality with his wife who works in a private corporation. His future plans are to finish building his home; because of his financial situation he is not able to buy all of the materials at once (tiles) since his priority is his son’s health. His son has had allergy problems since birth. He is grateful for the trust given to him by Afodenic and Kiva to be able to improve his home and for the help that they give to low income people.

loans.use: buy materials.

loans.name: Triunfo Del Amor Group

texts.es: Esta fotografia fue tomada en el negocio de la señora Hermila quien es presidenta del grupo "Triunfo del Amor, que esta ubicado en el estado de Morelos en MÉxico, en la fotografia se ve el local donde purifican el agua, ella se dedica a la venta de agua purificada, negocio que inicio hace 2 años, anteriormente se dedicaba a la costura pero se enfermo de la vista por lo que no podia continuar con la costura por esta razon decidio empezar con su nuevo negocio, solicita el prestamo para comprar garrafones de 20L y así poder llevar este producto a más hogares ya que en ocasiones en cada casa le piden 2 o 3 garrafones de agua, sus clientes la prefieren porque el agua que vende es un poco más economica y limpia, además de que les queda cerca de sus domicilios y tiene el servicio de llevarlo hasta sus casas, siendo la unica purificadora del pueblo, al momento de solicitar el prestamo se siente contenta, tiene 57 años estudio hasta el tercero de secundaria, es madre soltera, tiene un total de 2 hijos  varones, quiere este prestamo para tener mas garrafones y poder entregar mas agua, tambien espera con las ganacias poder brindarles materiales escolares a sus hijos.
texts.en: This photograph was taken at the business of Hermila, who is president of the group “Triunfo del Amor,” which is located in the state of Morelos, in Mexico. In the photograph you can see the place where they purify the water. She sells purified water, a business she started 2 years ago. Before that she worked in sewing, but then she started having a problem with her eyes and couldn’t continue sewing, which is why she decided to begin her own business. She is requesting a loan to buy 20-liter bottles so that she can take water to more homes, since sometimes each house will request 2 or 3 bottles of water. Her clients prefer her because the water she sells is a little more economical and cleaner. Also, her business is near their houses and they can have the service of having it brought to their houses. This is the only water purifying business in the town. When she requested the loan, she was content. She is 57 years old, she studied through the third year of secondary school, she is a single mother with 2 sons. She wants this loan so she can have more bottles and sell more water. She also hopes to be able to buy school supplies for her sons with the profits.

loans.use: to buy 20-liter water bottles

loans.name: Mujeres Bendecidas Group

texts.en:
Dolores is the coordinator of her group, 'Mujeres Bendecidas' 1, 2 & 3 (Women Blessed).  This is a group composed of 15 business women.  All of them are working to improve hers live and their family also, living in one of the poorest area around Santo Domingo city. 

Dolores makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their two children.  Dolores is excited to be seeking her second loan with Esperanza.  She successfully paid off her previous loan after using it to make a successful investment in her fried food stall.  She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying goods to make many meals, especially for dinner, like cooking oil, flour, potatoes, plantain, chicken, beef, etc.  She sells breakfast as well, so she will invest also in sausages bread, ham and cheese, and fruits to make natural juices.

She is saving her profits to buy a plot of land to start building her house.  Her most difficult challenge has been studying.  She likes to work and her future plan is to have her own house.  She thanks all of you for your support.

loans.use: to buy meat, cooking oil, flour, plantain, potatoes

loans.name: Sonia Beatriz

texts.es: Sonia Beatriz de veinticuatro años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de artículos de belleza y ropa, esto le ayuda a mantener a flote su hogar; Sonia vende artículos de muy buena calidad y a un buen precio se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues siempre tiene lo que necesitan además ella se caracteriza por su amabilidad y su carisma. Sonia sabe que la clave de un futuro exitoso está en el trabajo duro y esto la motiva a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar más productos como cremas, cosméticos, perfumes y ropa con variedad de estilos así Sonia podrá seguir vendiendo su mercadería y no decepcionara a sus clientes. Ella tiene fe que al prosperar su negocio le podrá dar a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Sonia Beatriz, 24, lives with her life partner and her child in her own home.  She has a business selling beauty products and clothing, which helps her to keep her household afloat.  Sonia sells good quality products at a good price.  She has attracted a lot of customers, because she always has what they need.  In addition, she is known for her friendliness and charm.  Sonia knows that the key to a successful future is hard work.  This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL which will allow her to buy more products such as creams, cosmetics, perfumes and clothing in a variety of styles, so that Sonia can keep selling her merchandise and avoid disappointing her customers.  Sonia has faith that with a thriving business she will be able to give her family a full life.

loans.use: to buy creams, cosmetics, perfumes and clothing

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel D. cincuenta y tres años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos los cuales asisten a la escuela D. la localidad. Ella posee negocio D. venta D. productos D. primera necesidad y le es muy rentable porque se encuentra en un lugar muy concurrido en la colonia en la que resiD., la clientela D. Isabel cada vez crece más pues ella siempre tiene lo que necesitan a un buen precio y los recibe muy servicial. Ella es una mujer muy motivada y siempre esta activa quiere ver crecer su negocio por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar productos como granos básicos, golosinas, pan, jabón, papel, bebidas entre otros, así podrá mantener a flote su tienda y mantenerse adelante D. la competencia. Isabel tiene la esperanza que lograra con su esfuerzo darle una vida plena y llena D. satisfacciones a su familia.
texts.en: Isabel, 53, lives with her life partner and their children, who attend the local school.  She has a business selling consumer staples, and it is very profitable because it is located in a very busy place in the neighborhood where she lives.  Isabel's clientele is growing each day, since she always has what they need at a good price and she provides them with very good service.  Isabel is a very motivated woman who is always active.  She wants to grow her business, and to do this she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase products such as staple grains, sweets, bread, soap, toilet paper, drinks and other items.  In this way she will be able to keep her business afloat and stay ahead of the competition.  Isabel hopes that with her efforts she will be able  to proviD. a life that is full of satisfactions for her family.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, sweets, bread, soap, toilet paper, and drinks

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es: Faustina vive con su compañero de vida cerca de lugar donde trabaja. Ella posee un negocio de comida y es muy recomendado en la localidad, además el lugar donde se encuentra  es muy concurrido pues está cerca de una terminal de buses. Faustina es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo y siempre recibe a los que la visitan con una sonrisa en el rostro, La comida que prepara tiene un sabor inigualable y la vende a precios muy accesibles esto ha logrado que se haga de mas clientela y no quiere decepcionar a las personas es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materiales como granos básicos, embutidos, carnes, verduras, lácteos, bebidas entre otros así tendrá siempre que ofrecer a sus clientes y estará adelante de su competencia. Faustina tiene fe que el amor y la dedicación con la que realiza su trabajo le dará la oportunidad de llevar a su hogar una estabilidad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en: Faustina lives with her life partner near the place where she works.  She has a food business that is highly recommended in the area.  In addition, the place where her business is located is very busy because it is close to a bus terminal.  Faustina is a woman who is dedicated to her work and who always greets her customers with a smile on her face.  The food that she prepares has an unparalleled flavor, and she sells her food at very affordable prices. Because of this, she has attracted more customers, and she does not want them to be disappointed.  For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy supplies such as staple grains, sausages, meat, vegetables, dairy products, drinks, and other products. In this way, she will always have food to offer her customers, and this will put her ahead of the competition.  Faustina has faith that with the love and dedication she puts into her work, she will be given the opportunity to bring economic stability and a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, sausages, meat, vegetables, dairy products and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy concentrate (animal feed)

loans.name: María Paula

texts.es: María Paula de treinta y nueve años de edad posee una venta de café con pan; es una mujer emprendedora muy dedicada a su trabajo, es todo un ejemplo a seguir siempre está con el optimismo de salir adelante; María es muy conocida en la localidad pues vende un café exquisito por las mañanas y por las tardes y le da a sus clientes un servicio que se merecen. María quiere ver crecer su negocio para ella no hay montaña tan alta y espera llegar a la cima en un futuro es por eso que está dispuesta a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar café, pan, vasos, termos, servilletas y otros de esta forma mantendrá satisfechos a los que la visitan y al mismo tiempo tiene confianza que  lograra darle a su familia una vida mejor llena de alegrías.
texts.en: Maria Paula is 39 years old. She sells bread and coffee. She is an enterprising woman who is very dedicated to her work. She is an example to others. She always moves forward with a positive outlook on life. Maria is well known in this area as she sells an exquisite cup of coffee in the mornings and the afternoons. She gives great service to her customers. Maria would like to grow her business. There is no mountain she cannot conquer. She hopes to reach the top of the mountain in the future. This is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan, which will allow her to buy coffee, bread, cups, thermoses, napkins and other items that will satisfy the people that visit her stand. With her business she has confidence that she can provide her family with a better life full of happiness.

loans.use: to buy coffee, bread, cups, thermoses and napkins.

loans.name: María Esmeralda

texts.es: María Esmeralda de 33 años de edad, reside en su casa con sus dos hijas de 12 y 7 años de edad, ambas se encuentran estudiando. María se dedica a la venta de tortillas. Tiene un pequeño negocio en su hogar de residencia en el cual cada mañana se levanta muy temprano para preparar los ingrediente y tener  listas las deliciosas tortillas que por su dedicación e higiene le demandan con mucha frecuencia. Para María lo mas importantes son sus hijas y no pierde la esperanza que algún día las verá convertidas en grandes profesionales.  Esto es lo que le da fuerza para seguir trabajando día a día. Además ha sabido ganarse la confianza de todos sus vecinos los cuales cada día le demandan más tortillas. María es  una mujer arriesgada y trabajadora por lo que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la materia prima necesaria como maíz, agua, gas propano, etc. Con el objetivo de cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita aumentar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Maria Esmeralda is 33 years old. She lives in a house with her two children, ages 12 and 17. Both her children are in school. Maria sells tortillas. She has a small business in her home. Every morning she gets up early in order to prepare the ingredients for her product. She prepares delicious tortillas that are frequently in demand as she is a dedicated and hygienic worker. The most important people for Maria are her children. She will not lose hope that one day they will have great professions. This is what gives Maria the motivation to work each day. She has also gained the respect of all of her neighbors, who each day request more tortillas. Maria is a hardworking and adventuresome woman. This is why she is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL. With this loan she will buy the basic ingredients needed to make tortillas such as corn, water, propane, etc. With these supplies she will be able to meet her customer’s requests, which will increase her earnings and therefore increase the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy the necessary raw materials such as corn, water, propane, etc.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca D. 54 años D. edad, vive en su casa con su esposo D. 72 años D. edad el cual ya es jubilado. Francisca lleva muchos años dedicándose al negocio. Gracias a su dedicación y disciplina ha logrado mantener activa una pequeña tienda dentro D. su hogar D. habitación. Francisca es una mujer ejemplar ya que a pesar D. su edad no se da por vencida y sigue luchando para mantener activo su negocio el cual le ha ayudado a sobrevivir durante muchos años. El lugar D. ubicación es muy estratégico se encuentra en una zona muy concurrida y D. fácil acceso por el momento cuanta con muchos clientes,  pero ella es una mujer emprendedora y quiere surtir su tiendita para que sea más atractiva y los cliente la prefieran mas. Esto la ha hecho tomar la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar variedad D. artículos D. tienda como golosinas, detergentes, azúcar, arroz, frijoles, aceite, papel, pan dulce y D. mas artículos que logren a traer a mas clientes. Con esto espera cumplir su sueño D. ver su tienda surtida y contar con muchos clientes que la prefieran por tener  todo lo necesario. A demás D. esta manera espera lograr mayores ganancias que le permitan acceder a una mejor vida.
texts.en: Francisca is 54 years old and lives with her husband, who is 72 years old and now retired.  For many years Francisca has run a business.  Thanks to her dedication and discipline, she has been able to maintain a small general store which she runs from her home.  She sets a great example,  never giving up,  she continues her struggle to run her business which has helped her survive for many years.     Her location is very strategic, with regular passers by and easy access.  Francisca has many clients for the moment, but she is an enterprising woman and she would like to stock her small store so that people find it attractive and prefer to shop there.     She's requesting a loan from Integral to purchase a variety of merchandise such as sodas, detergents, rice, sugar, beans, oil, paper, pastries and other items to help attract more customers.    With this investment, she hopes to get closer to her dream of seeing her store well stocked and visited by many customers who count on her.  In this way, Francisca hopes to increase her income,  enabling her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of merchandise for her general store, including sodas, detergents, sugar, rice, beans, oil, paper and bread.

loans.name: Milton David

texts.es:
Milton David tiene 28 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los dos hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Sofía, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Milton se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz,  arroz, frejol gandul. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas que atacan a los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar terrenos.

Le gusta hacer deporte y hacer los deberes con los hijos.
texts.en: Milton David is 28 years old and lives with his wife and their two children.  They live in El Canton Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios.   This area is known for its agriculture industry, and its short harvest season.      Milton grows corn, rice and beans and sells them in the marketplace in Ventanas.  He is requesting the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers.  The loan will help his economic situation and provide basic necessities, as he encounters problems such as diseases which attack the crops.  Milton's dream is to be able to buy some of his own land.   He enjoys sports and playing with his children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Rina Raquel

texts.es: Rina Raquel de 25 años de edad, vive en su casa con su compañero de vida. Ella se dedica a la venta ropa de manera ambulante en la zona donde reside. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio y es su principal fuente de ingresos. Ha logrado establecer buena clientela ya que ella siempre cuenta con variedad de prendas de vestir y sobre todo buenos precios, estas son las razones por las que muchas personas buscan sus productos y la prefieren. Trabaja duramente todo el día para lograr vender la mayoría de sus prendas y hasta el momento lo ha logrado. Últimamente la demanda de sus prendas de vestir se ha visto aumentada y muchas veces no cuenta con el producto suficiente para satisfacer a todos sus clientes. Es por esta razón que solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en variedad de prendas de vestir principalmente en ropa interior que es lo que más vende.  Confía que de esta manera logrará atraer a más clientes y podrá contar con mayores ingresos que le ayuden a mejorar su situación que por el momento es muy difícil.
texts.en: Rina Raquel is 25 years old and lives with her husband.  For many years, Rina has worked selling clothing around the area where she lives, and this provides her principal source of income.   She has established a good customer base and she offers a variety of clothing at good prices, which is why many people like to buy from her.    Rina works all day to sell the majority of her merchandise.  Lately, she's seen that there has been more demand, and many times she doesn't have what all of her customers want.   She is requesting a loan from Integral to invest in a variety of clothing, primarily underclothes, which she sells most often.  Rina is confident that with more variety, she can attract more customers and increase her income.   This will help her improve her situation, which at the moment is very difficult.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing to sell

loans.name: Victor Julio

texts.es:
Victor Julio tiene 23 años, es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Sofía, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Victor se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz,  arroz, frejol gandul. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es contruir la casa.

Le gusta estar con la familia y hacer deporte con ellos.
texts.en:
Victor Julio is 23 years old and married. He lives with his wife and children. He lives in the Ventanas Canton in Los Rios Province. 
His area is called October 27th. It is located in Recinto San Sofia, which belongs to the Ventanas Canton. This area is dedicated to rural agricultural. In the short growing season they grow corn, rice and beans. 
Victor works in agriculture, cultivating corn, rice and beans. Each month he buys his supplies in Ventanas and he sells his goods in the market of the same town.
He is asking for this loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer and compost. With the support of this loan, he will be able to buy the supplies that he needs. His dream is to buy his own house.
He likes to be with his family and play sports with them.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and compost.

loans.name: Luis Moreno

texts.es: Luis, de 65 años de edad, habita con su esposa Amelia de 60 años en su casa, los cuales ambos son jubilados. Luis es un hombre emprendedor y sobre todo trabajador ya que a pesar de  que es un hombre de avanzada edad y jubilado sigue luchando por una vida más digna para él y para su querida esposa. Su pequeña tienda  la tiene en su lugar de residencia, la cual se encuentra en una zona bastante difícil ya que no es de fácil acceso,  pero a pesar de eso tiene establecida muy buena clientela y es lo que le ha permitido tener en marcha su negocio. En su pequeña tienda ofrece productos básicos como son detergentes, bebidas, granos básicos y de más artículos necesarios para el cliente. Es un hombre lleno de sueños y uno de ellos es ver su negocio surtido con variedad de productos para que los clientes sigan llegando y aumente día con día. Para esto necesita cierta cantidad de dinero de la cual no dispone, esta es la razón por la cual solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar variedad de artículos de tienda como son: bebidas, golosinas, papel, azúcar, pan dulce, frijoles, aceite, etc. Con esto espera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Luis is 65 years old. He lives with his wife, Amelia, who is 60 years old, in their house. Both he and his wife are retired. Luis is an enterprising man and a hard worker. In spite of his advanced age and retirement he continues to struggle for a more dignified life for beloved his wife and himself. He has a small store in his home. His house is in a difficult location as it is not that accessible. In spite of this he has a good customer base and that is what allows him to keep his business going. In his small store he offers basic products such as detergent, drinks, basic grains and other items that his customers need. He is a man full of dreams and one of those is to provide a larger variety of goods to his customers. His customers continue to come to his store and there are more and more of them each day. Because of this he needs a certain amount of money, which he doesn’t have. This is why he is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL. He would like to buy more items for his store such as drinks, candies, paper, sugar, pastries, beans, oil, etc. With this loan he hopes to improve life for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of goods for his store such as drinks, candies, paper, sugar, pastries, beans, oil, etc.

loans.name: Digna Fidela

texts.es:
Digna Fidela tiene 38 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Sofía, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Digna se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz,  arroz, frejol gandul. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas que atacan a los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar terrenos.

Le gusta dedicarse por completo al hogar.
texts.en:
Digna Fidela is 38 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The October 27th Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Recinto San Sofia, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank is composed of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Digna is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She buys her supplies in Ventanas each month and sells her products at the fair in the same location.

Digna is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include pests that can attack her crops. Her dream is to buy plots of land.

Digna enjoys spending all of her time at home.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es: Doris Elizabeth de 38 años de edad, vive en casa de su esposo con sus 2 hijos de 17 y 15 años de edad que se encuentran estudiando. Doris trabaja duramente para sacar adelante a su familia y poder darles lo que ella nunca tuvo. Ella se dedica a la venta de artículos de belleza como lociones, cremas, champo, jabón con aroma, cosméticos etc. Este negocio lo hace de manera ambulante en la zona donde reside y en los alrededores de su comunidad. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que es una mujer amable y muy honesta en su trabajo siempre garantiza calidad en los productos que ofrece y además los precios y variedad de productos que ofrece es lo mejor.  Ha decidido aumentar  la variedad de productos que ofrece para que los clientes puedan tener más opciones a la hora de seleccionar o solicitar el producto que desean. Con la fe puesta en Dios de ver florecer su negocio a decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar variedad de cosméticos, lociones tanto para hombre como para mujer, cremas, jabones con aroma, desodorantes, etc. Y de esta manera espera lograr mejorar su calidad de vida y ofrecer a sus hijos una realidad diferente a la que ella tuvo.
texts.en:
Dora Elizabeth is 38 years old and lives at home with her husband and two children (ages 17 and 15) who are in school. She works hard so that she can help her family get ahead and provide them with what they need. Dora sells beauty products such as lotions, crèmes, shampoo, scented soaps, cosmetics, and other items. She operates her business as a traveling vendor in the area where she lives and in the surrounding areas. Dora has many customers because she is a friendly and honest woman. She always guarantees the quality of her products and offers a variety of merchandise at the best prices. Since she decided to increase the variety of products that she offers, her customers have more options from which to select or they can request the products that they want.

Dora places her faith in God to see her business prosper, so she decided to request this loan from Apoyo Integral to buy a variety of cosmetics, lotions for men and women, crèmes, scented soaps, deodorants, and other items. She hopes this loan will help her improve her quality of life and provide her children a different path than the one she has taken.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of cosmetics, lotions for men and women, crèmes, scented soaps, deodorants, and other items.

loans.name: Norma Margoth

texts.es:
Norma Margoth tiene 38 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama 27 DE OCTUBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Sofía, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra maíz, arroz, frejol gandul.

Norma se dedica a la agricultura en especial a la siembra de maíz,  arroz, frejol gandul. Las comprar las realiza en Ventanas cada mes y las vende en la feria de la misma localidad.

Solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos.  Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como plagas que atacan a los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar terrenos y tener casa propia.

Le gusta hacer la limpieza en la casa.
texts.en:
Norma Margoth is 38 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The October 27th Communal Bank is located in the neighborhood of Recinto San Sofia, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank is composed of short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Norma is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. She buys her supplies in Ventanas each month and sells her products at the fair in the same location.

Norma is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include pests that can attack her crops. Her dreams include buying land and having her own house.

Norma enjoys cleaning house.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana Gloria D. 33  años D. edad, resiD.  con su esposo y tres hijas D. 16,14 y 9 años en su casa. Durante mucho tiempo se ha dedicado al comercio  y esto es lo que le ha permitido sacar adelante a su familia. Gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo ha logrado establecer una pequeña tienda en su hogar D. residencia en el cual venD. variedad D. productos D. tienda como granos básicos, bebidas, golosinas, detergente, etc. Espera poder mantener activo  su pequeño negocio ya que es su principal fuente D. ingresos y espera que lo siga siendo por mucho tiempo ya que su sueño es poder dar a sus hijos el estudio y poder verlos convertidos en profesionales. Esto la ha impulsado a tomar  la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertirlo en la compra D. productos D. tienda como son: detergentes, bebidas, huevos, golosinas, frijoles, sal, azúcar y D. mas productos que permitan a traer a mas clientes que la lleven a aumentar su nivel D. ventas y sus ingresos que  le permitan mejorar su condición D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en:
Ana Gloria is 33 years old and resides with her husband and three daughters (ages 16, 14, and 9). She has spent a great deal of time working as a merchant so that her family can get ahead. Thanks to her effort and work, Ana Gloria was able to establish a small store in her home where she sells a variety of products such as basic grains, beverages, candy, detergent, and other items. She hopes that her small business will remain active since it is her main source of income. Ana Gloria expects to continue for a long time because her dream is to proviD. her children with an education so that they can become professionals.

She maD. the decision to request this loan from Apoyo Integral so that she can invest in the purchase of products for her store such as detergents, beverages, eggs, candy, beans, salt, sugar, and other items. This will help her attract more customers and increase her sales. As a result of a higher income, Ana Gloria will be able to improve the living conditions for herself and her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jose es de la comunidad de Ostional, una de las comunidades mas conocidas en el país .
Desde este año el obtuvo un nuevo trabajo en una empresa que promueve el desarrollo sostenible de la región. A pesar de que esta muy ocntento con su nuevo trabajo, Jose ha tenido problemas con el transporte ya que es muy largo, es por eso que el solicita un préstamo de ₡350 000 (trescientos mil colones) para la compra de su moto. Esto le ahorra muchos gastos, y  sobretodo tiempo que podrá aprovechar con su  familia.
El socio de la empresa de Crédito Comunal de Ostional, una de las 110 empresas de crédito socias de EDESA en Costa Rica
texts.en:
Jose is from the community of Ostional, one of the most well-known in the country. Last year, he obtained a new job working for a company that promotes sustainable development in the region. Even though he is happy with his new job, Jose has had problems with transportation since the distance to work is very far. For this reason, he is requesting a loan of 350,000 CRC to purchase a motorcycle. This will help him save on expenses and allow him more time to spend with his family.

Jose is a member of the Ostional Communal Credit Enterprise, one of the 110 credit organizations that are part of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle.

loans.name: Elba

texts.es:
La señora Elba, es una mujer de 38 años, quien curso unicamente el primer año de la educación primaria,vecina de Puntarenas, Corredores, La Cuesta, Bella Luz de la Vaca, Río Incendio, trecientos metros Norte de la escuela; una de las zonas del país con un menor indice de desarrollo humano;  madre de dos hijos menores de edad quienes cursan la educación primaria; se dedica a la actividad de la ganaderia, cria de cerdos, esta señora convivio durante años con un compañero, pero no se caso, sin embargo por haver convivido como pareja y tener dos hijos meñores de edad de esra relación, y verse imposibilitada por esta razón a realizar un trabajo remunerado fuera del hogar, se le concede una pensión del regimen de invalidez, vejez y muerte por un monto de 70,125.00 colones costarricenses, lo que es muy poco para poder dar calidad de vida a sus hijos, de allí es donde decide desde hace cinco años, buscar un complemento al ingreso familiar, lo que hace mediante la cria de cerdo, los que compra pequeños para poder engordarlos, durante un periodo de seis meses, y posteriomente los vende, para poder iniciar nuevamente un nuevo ciclo de producción; esta actividad se desarrolla en la parte de atras de la casa, donde ella ha acondicionado un espacio(chiquero), para tener los cerdos, esto ha sido posible por la reinversión de utilidades de ventas anteriores de cerdos.
En la zona de residencia de doña Elba, esta es una actividad factible de desarrollar, por cuanto se tiene sembrado en las parcelas banano y platano, que junto con el alimento concentrado, se utiliza para la alimentación de los cerdos con muy buenos resultados.
texts.en:
Sra. Elba is a 38-year-old woman who only has a first grade education. She lives in an area near Puntarenas, Corredores, La Cuesta, Bella Luz de la Vaca, Río Incendio. This location is 300 meters north of the school and has one of the lowest Human Development Index scores in the country.

Elba is the mother of two children who are attending elementary school. She raises livestock, specifically pigs. Elba has been in a common-law relationship with her companion for two years. Even though she and her partner are not married, they have two children as a result of their relationship. For this reason, she has not been able to work outside of the home. She receives a pension in the amount of 70,125 CRC, which is a very small amount for her to provide a decent quality of life for her children. Five years ago, Elba looked for a way to supplement the family income so she decided to raise pigs. She buys the animals when they are small so that she can fatten them. Elba raises them for a period of six months before selling them and starting the process over again. Her business is located in an area behind her house that is well-suited for keeping her pigs. She was able to construct a pig sty by reinvesting the profits from her previous sales.

Doña Elba has a viable business that she can develop from her home. She also has land on which she planted bananas and plantains. Elba will use her loan to buy concentrated feed for her pigs so that she can obtain excellent results.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and concentrated feed.

location.town: La Cuesta, Bella Luz de la Vaca

loans.name: Maria Olga

texts.es: Olga es madre D. 6 niños todos estudian en escuelas del municipio ella se dedica a tejer y ha sembrar hortalizas, su esposo es carpintero y también trabaja en la agricultura, ella ha sobresalido gracias  a los créditos que se le han brindado es por eso que solicita nuevamente otro crédito para poder utilizarlo en su negocio en comprar materia prima así poder obtener ganancias, ella promete seguir pagando D. la misma manera y estaría muy agradecida si se le brindara otro crédito, ella sueña con que sus hijos se gradúen D. alguna carrera pero para eso tiene que seguir trabajando mas y seguir ayudándolos a seguir adelante.
texts.en: Olga has 6 children. All of them study in local schools. She weaves and looks after her vegetable garden. Her husband is a carpenter and also works in agriculture. She has excelled thanks to the loans she has received in the past. That's why she is requesting a new loan to use in her business, so she can buy raw materials and achieve profits. She is committed to repaying it just as she has done in the past, and would be very grateful to receive a new loan. She dreams of seeing her children graduate from university but for that she needs to continue to work and help them get ahead.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for clothesmaking.

loans.name: Cesar Ramon

loans.name: Edgar Omar

texts.en:
Edgar is 44-years-old and lives in the city of Tulcán, a bordertown on Ecuador's border with Colombia.  He is divorced and lives with his family which includes three children, ages 22, 13, and 11 years old.  Edgar is a hardworking, flexible, persistent, and humble person. 

His business is a butcher shop and he will use this loan to purchase a freezer.  His shop is located in a central position in the general market.  He began his business with the support of his parents and confirms that their support was fundamental in helping him begin his business.  Edgar's shop is an established business with a steady clientele.  This is his first loan and he hopes that having a freezer will increase his sales so that he can give a better life to his children.  His goal is to give his children a good education, to encourage them to do honest work, and to teach them to have faith in themselves.  In the photo, Edgar is providing a customer with his products in his butcher shop.

loans.use: to buy a freezer for his butcher shop

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase different types of clothing.

loans.name: Solidario Flores De Sumpango Group

texts.es: Solidario Flores de Sumpango: este grupo esta formado por tres señoras las cuales se dedican a la agricultura y a la confeccion de tejidos doña Maria es la lider de este grupo y nos cuenta que estan contenta porque su negocio a prosperado ella como las otras socias se dedican a la misma actividad las tres señoras estan convencidas que nececitan mas capital para trabajar por eso estan solicictando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos.
texts.en:
'Flores de Sumpango' Solidarity Group

This group is made up of three ladies whose businesses are farming and weaving.

María is the leader of this group and she tells us that she is happy because her business is prospering.  She and her fellow group members are in the same business.  The ladies need more capital to work.  For this reason, they are requesting a loan to buy raw materials for weaving their products.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for weaving
